Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
05.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
26.03.2009 SH SCR14514 Added (BDET) bank account approval handling
27.10.2008 SH SR14060 Added UFB563.PI.USERID = blank
23.03.2007 SH SCR12342 Extended DCHD_DCNUMBERBANK from 20 to 40 alpha
10.11.2006 AK SCR12089 added (another empty) parameter when calling UFB563
06.11.2006 AK SCR12052 added (empty) parameter when calling UFB563
06.11.2006 SH SCR12078 Changed title of DCHD_COSTSINGCOMFIN
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- If button OK is pressed and nothing is changed on screen
-- In case of error return to screen
... else store changes
-- in case of a new DC, the database changes are done in OAD722
-- Init DCHD_ING = TRUE if BDET_NAMEBANK included "ING"
-- Search/enter bank details
-- Check if selected bankaccount is approved
... Error message: "Bankaccount is not approved yet"
-- Init DCHD_ING = TRUE if BDET_NAMEBANK included "ING"
... else query/modify bank details
-- Check if selected bankaccount is approved, perhaps the users added a new bank
account or modified the selected account which has to be approved before the
DC can be closed (the BDET_ID is stored in this module)
... Info message: "Bankaccount is not approved yet"
-- Init DCHD_ING = TRUE if BDET_NAMEBANK included "ING"
-- Search/enter bank details
-- Check if selected bankaccount is approved
... Error message: "Bankaccount is not approved yet"
... else query/modify bank details
-- Check if selected bankaccount is approved, perhaps the users added a new bank
account or modified the selected account which has to be approved before the
DC can be closed (the BDET_ID is stored in this module)
... Info message: "Bankaccount is not approved yet"
-- change to modify mode

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,19}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,36}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,37}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,40}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,41}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,42}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,43}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,44}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,45}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,38}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,39}'VAR)

Text.val: @ Changes acc. to both bank fields have to be also implemented in OAD722, where
OAD727 is called auto. (See "CheckEntries" in OAD722)
-- Opening bank is mandatory
-- Invalid opening bank
-- Corresponding bank mandatory
-- Invalid corresponding bank
-- Opening date is mandatory
-- reference number is mandatory
-- No errors
-- write changes to history
